dc_title_s: Hainan Administrative Boundaries, Coast Lines and Islands, 2000
dc_description_s: Hainan Administrative Boundaries, Coast Lines and Islands, 2000 is a polyline theme representing administrative boundaries (country, provinces), coastlines, and islands in Hainan Province in China for the year 2000. This data layer is part of the China 2000 Township Census data set produced by the All China Marketing Research Co. and distributed by the University of Michigan, China Data Center.
dc_creator_sm: University of Michigan. China Data Center.
Beijing Hua tong ren shi chang xin xi you xian ze ren gong si
